INDEX.text: Discover the power of relaxation in the comfort of your home in Berlin.

HOWWORK.title: How Does Your Massage Experience Work?

text.scheduling.description: Appointments are made exclusively through WhatsApp, as I am deaf and communicate via messages. Simply send me a message to book your session.
text.preparation.description: I recommend keeping the room calm and well-ventilated before my arrival to ensure a more relaxing experience.
text.arrival.description: I will arrive at the scheduled time, bringing everything necessary for the massage: a professional massage table, oils, and soothing music. You don't have to worry about anything!
text.initialConversation.description: Before we begin, we will have a brief conversation to understand what you expect from the massage and what kind of touch you prefer, always focusing on your well-being.
text.massage.description: I use techniques that promote deep relaxation, restore your energy, and create a sense of lightness and calm. The goal is to renew your body and mind, offering a unique sense of well-being.
text.closing.description: After the massage, I will help you dress and give you a few simple tips to extend the positive effects of the session.
text.payment.description: Payment can be made in cash, by card, or via Google Pay. After the session, we say goodbye, and you can start your day refreshed and rejuvenated!

ABOUTME.title: About Me
ABOUTME.text: My name is Fahed, I am a Luso-Brazilian massage therapist of Lebanese descent. I have been a professional massage therapist since 2021 and completed my training in Portugal. I am passionate about massage and always strive to promote relaxation and well-being. I am an oralized deaf person, which makes me especially attentive to my clients' needs. I communicate clearly, understand some English, and am learning German to serve you even better. My priority is to offer a personalized service, making each session unique, relaxing, and tailored to your expectations. Treat yourself to an unforgettable well-being experience. Book your massage and recharge your energy today!

ATENCAO.text: Attention: The service is solely focused on well-being. I do not perform therapeutic massages, treatments, or procedures for pain relief.
